thread.section_title: Frames Direct Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Frames Direct | www.framesdirect.com | 7 of 657
thread.title: Susan S.
thread.title_full: Frames Direct reviewed by Susan S.

author: Susan S.
title: Susan S.
text: I was very nervous about ordering unseen and untried-on frames, but am thrilled with the results. I took a long time choosing a frame and making sure the measurements were correct for me. I played it safe by getting new frames similar to what I had. The glasses arrived quickly with the correct prescription. I did have to go to an optometrist to get the nose pads adjusted. I have recommended friends - they have been amazed when I told them what my progressive lenses cost.
